|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3566; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-G52; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit

|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = ;PS122-PG; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2021 |estprice = 50 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-CM256SM |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "SOQUARTZ_V1.1_20220711" is silkscreened on board top. :"PINE64", "Built in Silicon Delta,China" and "Designed in Silicon Valley, California" are silkscreened on the board bottom.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3566 @1.8GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: eMMC Flash connector (16-128GB available) *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Cypress]] CYW43455 :802.11bgn+ac (1T1R), BT 5.0 *Network: 1x GbE port via connectors *Power Source: 5V via connectors
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/SOQuartz ''SOQuartz'' on '''PINE64 Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/08/soquartz-raspberry-pi-cm4-compatible-som-rockchip-rk3566/ ''SOQuartz â€“ Raspberry Pi CM4 compatible Rockchip RK3566 SoM'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/pine64-soquartz-compute-module-with-rk3566-goes-on-sale-next-week-for-35-and-up/ ''Pine64 SOQuartz compute module with RK3566'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://jamesachambers.com/pine64-soquartz-cm4-alternative-review/ ''Pine64 SOQuartz CM4 Alternative Review'' on '''James A. Chambers''' Blog] *[https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2021/pine64-and-radxas-new-pi-cm4-compatible-boards ''Pine64 and Radxa's new Pi CM4-compatible boards'' on '''Jeff Geerling''' Blog]
